solution_line_template: From Monday to Tuesday, Nico reads a total of {pages_monday} + {pages_tuesday} = <<{pages_monday}+{pages_tuesday}={pages_mon_tue}>>{pages_mon_tue} pages.
On Wednesday, he read a total of {total_pages_mon_wed} - {pages_mon_tue} = <<{total_pages_mon_wed}-{pages_mon_tue}={pages_wednesday}>>{pages_wednesday} pages.
